sentence.Network_en: A deep - rooted tree is leafy ; an ambitious man is vigorous.
sentence.Network_cn: 根深 叶才茂,志壮干劲高.

sentence.Network_en: It is difficult to get rid of deep - rooted habits.
To cure deep - rooted disease is generally a long process.
sentence.Network_cn: 治愈根深蒂固的病一般来说是一个很长的过程.

above all , the turtles have no deep roots in the party system and its intricate , largely hidden webs of personal connections and patronage .最重要的是，在共产党体系及其错综复杂、极其隐蔽的人际关系与庇护网络中，海归并没有深厚的根基。

entry.def: Deep-rooted means the same as deep-seated .

example.tran: 针对一个根深蒂固的问题的长期解决方案

example.ex: ...the deep-rooted divisions and suspicions between the two superpowers.
example.tran: 两个超级大国之间根深蒂固的分歧和猜忌
